title: btc_breakthrough
body:
﻿1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:33,079
Speaker 0: This is the CNN Breaking News Alert for Monday, May 15th, 2023 at 3.40 p.m. Eastern Time. At least three people are dead after a shooting this afternoon in Farmington, New Mexico. Two police officers were shot and are in stable condition. According to police, one suspect was confronted and killed on the scene. The suspect's identity is unknown and there are no other known threats at this time. For more on this developing story and others, listen to the next edition of CNN 5 Things at 5 p.m. Eastern Time.
